## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have run `pnpm lint` and fixed all errors
- [ ] I have run `pnpm format` to format my code
- [ ] All functions have JSDoc comments

### Agent Library (if applicable)
- [ ] Agent follows the template structure
- [ ] Agent has clear inputs/outputs documented
- [ ] Agent includes real-world examples
- [ ] Agent is categorized correctly

### Testing
- [ ] I have run `pnpm test` in the CLI directory
- [ ] I have tested the CLI tool locally
- [ ] YAML configuration files are valid

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated CLAUDE.md if needed
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments to new functions
- [ ] I have updated README.md if needed
- [ ] Agent library README is updated (if adding agents)
